cj.lns.chip.sos.website.framework

接口 IRemoteDevice

  • 所有已知实现类:
    RemoteDevice

    public interface IRemoteDevice
     以下是珍爱网判断和跳转手机网站的方法
 UA = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
 url = window.location.toString();
 if ((UA.indexOf('iphone') != -1 || UA.indexOf('mobile') != -1
                || UA.indexOf('android') != -1 || UA.indexOf('ipad') != -1
                || UA.indexOf('windows ce') != -1 || UA.indexOf('ipod') != -1)
                && UA.indexOf('ipod') == -1) {
                location.href = "http://m.zhenai.com/u/84428905";
 }
    作者:
    carocean
